short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add generative AI results to your search results.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Switching between AI services and search results can be a hassle. Now, search in both at once! This extension adds an AI answer to the top of your search results. Feel free to use always, or toggle to "when you click the extension" to use more selectively.
